data.name: Smeargle

abilities.name: Portrait
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Smeargle is your Active Pokémon, you may look at your opponent's hand. If you do, choose a Supporter card you find there and use the effect of that card as the effect of this power. This power can't be used if Smeargle is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Tail Rap
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

data.flavorText: Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let its comrades plant footprints on its back.

data.name: Smeargle

attacks.name: Sketch
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon attacked last turn, and Smeargle was in play during that attack, Smeargle copies that attack except for its Energy costs and anything else required in order to use that attack.

data.flavorText: A special fluid oozes from the tip of its tail. It paints the fluid everywhere to mark its territory.

data.name: Smeargle

abilities.name: Portrait
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Smeargle is your Active Pokémon, you may look at your opponent's hand. If you do, choose a Supporter card you find there and use the effect of that card as the effect of this power. This power can't be used if Smeargle is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Tail Rap
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

data.flavorText: Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let its comrades plant footprints on its back.

data.name: Smeargle

attacks.name: Paint
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose a type (other than Colorless) and put a Coloring counter on the Defending Pokémon. That Pokémon is now the type you chose. If it already had a Coloring counter, remove the old one. If tails, this attack does nothing.

data.flavorText: Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let its comrades plant footprints on its back.

data.name: Smeargle

attacks.name: Sketch
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon attacked last turn, and Smeargle was in play during that attack, Smeargle copies that attack except for its Energy costs and anything else required in order to use that attack.

data.flavorText: A special fluid oozes from the tip of its tail. It paints the fluid everywhere to mark its territory.

attacks.name: Collect
attacks.text: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Flickering Tail
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is Pokémon-ex, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

abilities.name: Makeover
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a basic Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokémon (excluding Pokémon-ex). If you do, search your discard pile for a basic Energy card (excluding the one you discarded) and attach it to that Pokémon. This power can't be used if Smeargle is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Split Spiral Punch
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

data.name: Smeargle

attacks.name: Color Pick
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 basic Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Trace
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose an attack on 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. Trace copies that attack except for its Energy cost. (You must still do anything else required for that attack.) Smeargle performs that attack.

data.flavorText: It marks its territory by using its tail like a paintbrush. There are more than 5,000 different marks.

data.name: Smeargle

abilities.name: Second Coat
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may switch a basic Energy card attached to your Active Pokémon with a different type of basic Energy card from your discard pile.

data.flavorText: Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let its comrades plant footprints on its back.

attacks.name: Paint Trick
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused. Then, choose 1 of your Benched Pokémon and switch Smeargle with it.

attacks.name: Doublslap
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

data.name: Smeargle

attacks.name: Stunning Likeness
attacks.text: Your opponent reveals their hand. You may use the effect of a Supporter card you find there as the effect of this attack.

attacks.name: Tail Smash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

data.flavorText: It draws symbols all over the place to mark its territory. In towns with many Smeargle, the walls are covered in graffiti.

data.name: Smeargle

attacks.name: Live Painting
attacks.text: Reveal any number of basic Energy cards from your hand. This attack does 30 more damage for each type of basic Energy you revealed in this way.

data.flavorText: It draws symbols with the fluid that oozes from the tip of its tail. Depending on the symbol, Smeargle fanatics will pay big money for them.

data.name: Smeargle

attacks.name: Sketching Trash
attacks.text: Put up to 2 Fusion Strike Trainer cards from your discard pile into your hand.

data.flavorText: It draws symbols with the fluid that oozes from the tip of its tail. Depending on the symbol, Smeargle fanatics will pay big money for them.

data.name: Smeargle

attacks.name: Colorful Palette
attacks.text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may attach any number of basic Energy cards you find there to 1 of your Pokémon. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

data.flavorText: It draws symbols with the fluid that oozes from the tip of its tail. Depending on the symbol, Smeargle fanatics will pay big money for them.

data.name: Smeargle

attacks.name: Colorful Palette
attacks.text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may attach any number of basic Energy cards you find there to 1 of your Pokémon. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

data.flavorText: It draws symbols with the fluid that oozes from the tip of its tail. Depending on the symbol, Smeargle fanatics will pay big money for them.

data.name: Smeargle

attacks.name: Live Painting
attacks.text: Reveal any number of basic Energy cards from your hand. This attack does 30 more damage for each type of basic Energy you revealed in this way.

data.flavorText: It draws symbols with the fluid that oozes from the tip of its tail. Depending on the symbol, Smeargle fanatics will pay big money for them.

data.name: Smeargle

attacks.name: Energizing Sketch
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. Attach an amount of Basic Energy up to the number of heads from your discard pile to your Benched Pokémon in any way you like.

data.flavorText: Once a Smeargle reaches adulthood, it will have other members of its species leave paw prints on its back.
